pages.text: The charging station is a mid-tier machine that is used for charging energy cells. The machine has 1 input slot, 1 output slot an $(l:machine_mechanics#upgrade)upgrade slot$(/l).

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Items that support Forge Energy (FE) API may also be charged in the charging station. $(br)Available Recipes may differ on mod setup and should be viewed with Just Enough Items (JEI).
